name: Unown E
author: CR CG gangs
flavor_text: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

abilities.name: [Engage]
abilities.effect: When you play Unown E from your hand, your opponent may shuffle his or her hand into his or her deck and then draw 4 cards. Either way, you may shuffle your hand into your deck and draw 4 cards.

rule_box: You may have up to 4 Basic Pokémon cards in your deck with Unown in their names.
